reviews.review_msg: David is an absolute gem. Very thoughtful, and genuinely LISTENS to what you have to say. Really refreshing, very organized. Great!
he is an easy marker. and he is kind and easy going
He knows his stuff but never tries to help out students. Sometimes hard to understand his accent
I have been taking Chris' courses for three consecutive terms and I can easily state that these terms have been the most joyful times of my academic journey. He is one of a kind!
If you haven't taken a class with Roman, you are missing out. Funny, totally scandalous in class, makes you WANT to come to class.
a life changing experience... what else to say. i do not know who from cmns profs can measure up to roman...

witty and clever, makes all topics relatable.  Inspired me to become a professor uses a method that encourages and requires your learning.  No power points or notes online.  GO to class, it's worth it,

Great prof!!! He is the reason I decided to minor in communications. Very helpful and easy to talk to. Lectures are very interesting and you can actually relate to them!!! Best prof in my all academic years!!!

rate prof, he shows a great interest of the subject. during his lectures we can see that he got a lot of knowlegde from a variety subjects. some times, even whe he is off topic, we can still a lot learn from it.
Yes, Roman is a tad disorganized, but there is a method to his madness and if one puts in the effort to do all the required work for the course Roman's lectures become interesting as well as usefull.
Roman is the best prof I've ever had.  His courses are great.

Roman is so hot. He teaches from the heart. True, his class is a real challenge, he is determined to get the most out of his students. His aim is to open the eyes of his students to the reality of society, its institutions and technology. A real inspiration. If you're simple and linear, you will have trouble understanding him.
